title: Elrich: Guardian of the Firestone
description: A young orphaned gambler's life changes the very moment he finds himself in possession of Dragon Lord Vorghul's firestone. Elrichâ€™s life becomes more complicated when the queen of Witchesville, Queen Witch Moribund and the king of Wiltshire, Gilfillan II learn about the true power of the Firestone. In the wrong hands the firestone could destroy all life in the universe and with so much wrong hands hounding him, Elrich must guard the firestone from the bloodthirsty, even if it means losing his life and his loved ones.  The novel makes a great gift for fantasy readers who couldn't put down A Game of Thrones.
author: Richard  Turner
